mean_cn: v.选择，挑选；  adj.精选的，选择的
mean_en: to choose somebody/something from a group of people or things, usually according to a system; to mark something on a computer screen; to choose something, especially from a menu
sentence: Which dress do you think I should select?
sentence_trans: 你觉得我应该选哪条裙子？
word_etyma: se分开 + lect选 → 选出分开 → select选择
